author: Charlie Rosenbam
comment: This app was completely inaccurate in step counting and in temp. Worse it acted viral by continually placing itself on my phones home screen.

author: Tj Van der Burgt
comment: This is by far the best watch face I have ever used, but there are some things that need to be able to change. There should be a 12hour clock and the ability to reset steps because it looks odd past the hundreds. Add those and 5 stars all the way

reply.author: Chongqing Huaining Information Technology Co., Ltd

title: Awesome

author: John Macdonald
comment: It is a cool app...but the developer should develop the ability to change the icons....I would rather have #of messages vs step count as an example...change this and it is 5 ☆
title: Good..but

author: Ian McCall
comment: Thanks for designing such a great watchface....especially in dimmed mode.

reply.author: Chongqing Huaining Information Technology Co., Ltd

title: Awesome watch face

author: E Warren
comment: It is not showing up as an option for a watch face

reply.author: Chongqing Huaining Information Technology Co., Ltd
reply.content: Please wait a minute for the app to sync between your phone and watch.

title: Bought this thinking it was cool but....

author: Brian Farley
comment: Needs the ability to change some things.

reply.author: Chongqing Huaining Information Technology Co., Ltd
reply.content: The app has 12/24 hour option and step counter automatic reset in latest update.

title: Cool but....

author: Mark Ingram
comment: Temperature not showing correctly, parallax option is awful and doesn't work properly, settings revert when you go back into the app.... Why did I buy this?
title: Disappointed
